attributes.action: allow ALL members of the public, including those not yet eligible to vote, to be consulted on proposed constitutional reforms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any changes to the constitution will affect ALL members of the public for many years to come. It will affect how WE interact with OUR legislators. It will affect the role of OUR legislators. It will affect everybody's everyday lives in quite profound manner. It is therefore essential that ALL members of the public, including those who will be able to vote in the future, should be allowed to have their say on any proposed changes/reforms to our current constitution.
